title: Notify Residents of Road Closure for a Parade
description: The city has approved a parade. An operator must notify residents and businesses along the route of upcoming road closures.

tasks.description: Retrieve the approved parade route and the schedule for road closures.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gets the geographic route and timing details.

tasks.description: Generate a list of all residential and commercial addresses along the parade route.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gets a list of all affected properties.

tasks.description: Send a targeted notification email or text message to all affected addresses about the closures.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully sends the targeted alert.
